docs.snippet: Ralph Gibson self-published his own photo books decades ago. Now, those books — filled with dreamlike sequences — have been released in a single volume.

docs.snippet: Todd Helton now regularly drives his two daughters to school or other activities back home in Tennessee, a huge life change for Colorado's former All-Star first baseman.

docs.snippet: As we mark International Women’s Day, the Milanese jeweler Pomellato is tracing down milestones in women’s rights through the years, from the explosion of the women’s movement in the late 1960s, when the brand was founded, until today.

headline.main: How Women Are Paving The Road to Equality
